TEXT.S:
balunga maazih ku balunga i teban nu bayu.
siwkay nu balulu tinaku a kamu makabalunga makabalunga kaku tayza i Butud. misabalunga matineng misabalunga ku i Butuday a tatama. misabalungaay u misabalungaay ku acawa nu maku. pabalunga pabalunga tayza i Butud. pabalungaay ; manamuh kaku tu pabalungaay..
u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika : Watercraft or vessel are water-borne vehicles including ships, boats, hovercraft and submarines. Watercraft usually have propulsive capability (whether by sail, oar or engine) and hence are distinct from a simple device that merely floats, such as a log raft.
